\begin{axis}[width=7cm,height=5cm,ylabel=$\phi(r)$,xlabel=$r$,xmin=0, ymin=0, xmax=3,ymax=3]
\addplot [draw=neutral_4,fill=neutral_4, fill opacity=1.0]coordinates {
    (0, 0) 
    (1, 1)
    (0.5, 1)
    (0, 0)  };
\addplot [draw=neutral_4,fill=neutral_4, fill opacity=1.0]coordinates {
    (1, 1) 
    (3, 1)
    (3, 2)
    (2, 2)  };
\addplot[color=primary_0,thick] table[mark=none,skip first n=1,x index=0, y index=1] {vanAlbada.dat};      
\end{axis}

\fill[color=neutral_4] (6.5,2.4) rectangle (7,2.6);
\node (l2)at (7,2.5) [label=right:{second-order TVD region}]{};

\draw [draw=primary_0,thick] (6.5,1.5) edge (7,1.5);
\node (l3)at (7,1.5) [label=right:{van Albada flux limiter}]{};
